channel.title: [PI] How do i make it so certain NPC's can hit through prayer? (REPPING++)
channel.description:
Yeah just need to know because i just added nomad and if you use pro melle he cant hit you lol :s
Thanks :)

item.title: [PI] How do i make it so certain NPC's can hit through prayer? (REPPING++)
item.dc:creator: @Raw_Envy Raw Envy
item.description:
@Raw_Envy wrote:

II john II:

easy NPCHandler.java go there and find ur npc case. for example case ####: . the #### is the id of the npc and then look at other npcs and u can figure it out i think. u just put the attack type 0 or 1 or 2 or 3 and then under it u put gfx and the stuff it needs when i first tryed doing that i knew how to do it by looking at other cases goodluck

Cant figure it out i cant see anything in my files to do with itâ€¦

item.title: [PI] How do i make it so certain NPC's can hit through prayer? (REPPING++)
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

easy NPCHandler.java go there and find ur npc case. for example case ####: . the #### is the id of the npc and then look at other npcs and u can figure it out i think. u just put the attack type 0 or 1 or 2 or 3 and then under it u put gfx and the stuff it needs when i first tryed doing that i knew how to do it by looking at other cases goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How do i make it so certain NPC's can hit through prayer? (REPPING++)
item.dc:creator: @Raw_Envy Raw Envy
item.description:
@Raw_Envy wrote:

II john II:

One of the ways is adding different attack styles like Range Mage Melee with the same gfx as it is which will cause the monster to hit in the same way but mage instead of melee and it wont show that the hit was mage since it has same gfx.

How do i do that then?

Read full topic
